title: Bikewatching: Boston Bike Traffic Visualization
description: An interactive visualization built with Mapbox GL JS and D3.js, displaying live Bluebikes traffic patterns in Boston. Users can explore arrival and departure activity, flow direction, and temporal patterns through an adjustable time filter slider and dynamic circle sizing and coloring.
